summary: The bill, titled the "Improving Social Security’s Service to Victims of Identity Theft Act," aims to improve the support provided by the Social Security Administration (SSA) to individuals whose Social Security numbers have been misused or whose Social Security cards have been lost. It mandates the SSA to establish a single point of contact for these individuals to navigate the resolution of their cases, ensuring coordination and accountability until the issue is resolved. This includes a team of specially trained employees.
